item.title: On-Camera Video Task - $70 - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone who’s not camera shy to help with a quick video task. No video editing required!

Pay:
$70 for a short video task

Requirements:

Comfortable being on camera
Reliable and punctual

Budget: $70

Category: Video Production

item.title: Videographer for Confidential Listing Video - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:  
MidStreet Mergers & Acquisitions is seeking a videographer for a full-day shoot to create a listing video for one of our clients. This project requires sensitivity to confidentiality, as the employees of the business are unaware that it is being marketed for sale. The shoot will involve capturing b-roll footage of the business operations and conducting a video interview with the business owner.

Responsibilities:  
-  Capture b-roll footage of the business from the start of the business day through normal operating hours.
-  Along with a representative from MidStreet, shoot a video interview with the business owner, likely scheduled for after business hours to maintain confidentiality.
-  Travel to a few customer locations within the greater Charlotte, NC area to film the company’s work in action.
-  Adhere to the highest standards of confidentiality and professionalism, explaining the project as a marketing video for the company's website if asked.
-  Work collaboratively with the business owner and the MidStreet team to ensure all required footage is captured.

Requirements:
-  Proven experience in videography, particularly in creating business or marketing videos.
-  Strong attention to detail and the ability to maintain confidentiality.
-  Excellent communication skills and a professional demeanor.
Ability to travel to various locations within the greater Charlotte, NC area.
-  Own professional video equipment.

Preferred Qualifications:
-  Experience in corporate or business videography.
-  Familiarity with the greater Charlotte, NC area.

Details:
-  Location: Greater Charlotte, NC area
-  Duration: Full-day shoot

How to Apply:
-  Please submit your portfolio and a brief cover letter explaining your experience and why you are a good fit for this project. Include any relevant examples of previous work.

MidStreet Mergers & Acquisitions is committed to maintaining the highest level of confidentiality and professionalism. Join us in creating a high-quality, impactful video for our client's business! We have several examples you can review at www.midstreet.com/video-library/marketing

Hourly Range: $30.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 19:32 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, People, Videography, Video Production
Skills: Business, People, Videography, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply
